item.title: Gerry Duggan // Writer, Producer
item.itunes:title: Gerry Duggan // Writer, Producer
item.description:
In this week's Pointless, comic book writer Gerry Duggan reveals his latest opus, Analog. It features a world where humanity's dirty laundry is aired out on the internet for all to witness. Ignore any parallels to the real world, because spoiler alert... we're living in a simulation.

 

Follow Gerry on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GerryDuggan 

Follow Kevin on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/attack

@kevper on Instagram

item.title: C.T. Fletcher // World's Strongest Man
item.itunes:title: C.T. Fletcher // World's Strongest Man
item.description:
C.T. Fletcher is a three-time bench press world champion, a three-time strict curl world champion, and a three-time flat line heart attack survivor. He has inspired oodles at his Iron Addicts gym and online as a viral star. Today he's here to chat with Kevin about the patreon campaign and documentary of his Last Will and Testament, his time on the Joe Rogan Experience, and defending Terry Crews. 

 

C.T.'s Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/CTFletcher

Follow C.T. on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CTFletcherISYMF

Follow Kevin on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/attack

@kevper on Instagram

@AttackSnap on Snapchat

item.title: Mia Khalifa // Host & Social Media Personality
item.itunes:title: Mia Khalifa // Host & Social Media Personality
item.description:
Oh, hey there. I know it's been a while and I'm sorry. But I'm here now and that makes it better, right? Today I have Mia Khalifa in our new podcast studio at The Attack. Together we go on a journey and learn about her open warrants, feelings for Elon Musk, and she even educates me a bit on the sports! 

Follow Mia on Twitter: https://twitter.com/miakhalifa

Follow Kevin on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/attack

@kevper on Instagram

@AttackSnap on Snapchat

item.title: NYC Rambling: Failing Forward
item.description:
This year I launched a new production company and built out a full studio to create shows for Comic-Con HQ. That ride came to a sudden, screeching halt. Here’s my honest, albeit rambling untangling of the last two weeks.

I want to thank Lionsgate/Comic-Con HQ for giving us the opportunity to swing away and play with some dear friends. I wish their platform the absolute best and hope our professional paths cross again in the near future.

Also, thanks to that swing, The Attack still has a home packed with enough goodies to create all manner of whimsy. So feel free to tune in and watch the next chapter unfold in real-time: http://www.TheAttack.tv

Have a question for Papa Kev? Looking for advice? A suggestion for the show? Send it all over to pointless@attack.media and have all your wildest dreams come true.

Follow Kevin : https://www.twitter.com/Attack

With music by: The American Dollar // Caspian // The Dear Hunter
